cleaned_text: Healing](https://lifespa.com/intro-ayurveda/intentional-meditation-for-distance-healing/) Have you tried remote healing or energy healing? During my training in India, I visited distance healers who would look at a photo of a relative, meditate on that picture while taking your pulse—and then heal them for just a few rupees. New research may link energy healing, distance healing, and healing prayer to a release of DNA-sourced biophotons caused by our intentions. Read on to learn the science behind it and allow me to teach you a meditation for distance healing.
